name: Auto Code Formatter
description: Automatically formats code files after edit operations using appropriate formatters

hooks.command: FILE=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.file_path // empty'); if [[ $FILE == *.ts || $FILE == *.tsx || $FILE == *.js || $FILE == *.jsx ]]; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ $FILE == *.py ]]; then black "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ $FILE == *.go ]]; then gofmt -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

FILE=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.file_path // empty'); if [[ $FILE == *.ts || $FILE == *.tsx || $FILE == *.js || $FILE == *.jsx ]]; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ $FILE == *.py ]]; then black "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ $FILE == *.go ]]; then gofmt -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

setup_instructions:
This hook automatically formats code after edits. Supports:
- TypeScript/JavaScript: prettier
- Python: black
- Go: gofmt

Install formatters as needed:
- npm install -g prettier
- pip install black
